title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Managerial Capacity Development Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational management theories and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 85% accuracy in management decision-making simulations by utilizing gamification elements
Learners can generate and execute at least three team management strategies through competitive/collaborative game mechanics

Using a digital feedback system (including 360-degree evaluation modules), learners will self-diagnose project management competencies (time/budget/quality) across three dimensions (planning-execution-evaluation) and develop improvement plans with over 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
